_sText:
PLEASE RATE
==================

In this map the objective is each team to carve out a better fort than the others in 90 seconds, before given guns to fight.

This is similar to the original mg_buildfort however I was tired of trolls on teams destroying the whole fort leaving the team defenceless.

In this version one person from each team is randomly selected to build and is given a little extra time.
 


Added:
------------------

Electrical water hazard between bases

1 Astronaut helmet per team, triggering low gravity

3 weapon vending machines per team

NoFallDamage

Secret area with sidearms 

Bridge spawns after 240 seconds


#### Credits

Acid - Original Mapper

Nyro - Troubleshooting

Guero - Inspiration

Tester - To be announced when the beta is tested; will republish map as mg_buildfort_final
